Godfrey Ho's Enter the Invincible Hero features a loner and a martial arts expert who team up to avenge the surviving members of a village that was slaughtered by ninjas. They come across an unsavory security firm that they decide to straighten out. But they have skills the heroes never imagined.

Leave your thoughts/opinions and ratings on the A/V of this film for others to see.

   Ground Zero's DVD are cheap for a reason, they mostly suck. They're taken from crappy VHS prints, but I keep buying them regardless. I doubt it'll ever see a Superbit release and the GZ is the only version available in North America (there is an R2 disc), so it's not like we got much of a choice. 

Pease SEED as you DL so others may also enjoy the movie!
